pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference and Prediction of ToxicoKinetic (TK) Models // The MOSAICbioacc application is a turnkey package providing bioaccumulation factors (BCF/BMF/BSAF) from a toxicokinetic (TK) model fitted to accumulation-depuration data. It is designed to fulfil the requirements of regulators when examining applications for market authorization of active substances. See Ratier et al. (2021) doi:10.1101/2021.09.08.459421.
